description: This is a Dart source file defining the CartProvider class, which manages shopping cart items for a Flutter application. It provides methods to add, remove, update quantities, and compute totals related to cart items.

classes.name: CartProvider
classes.description: A change notifier class managing cart items, including addition, removal, quantity updates, and total price calculations.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a book to the cart or updates quantity if it already exists.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a book from the cart by its ID.

methods.name: setQty
methods.description: Sets the quantity for a specific cart item, clamped between 1 and 999.

methods.name: increment
methods.description: Increases the quantity of a cart item by one.

methods.name: decrement
methods.description: Decreases the quantity of a cart item by one, ensuring minimum is 1.

methods.name: formatCents
methods.description: Formats an amount in cents into a currency string, supporting INR and USD.
